Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 240 (Roll no. 512).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Takano.

description: Amendment sought to replace section 3 with a new provision allowing the Secretary to suspend without pay any VA employee whose performance or misconduct threatens public health or safety, including the health and safety of veterans; and may remove a suspended employee after such investigation and review as the Secretary considers necessary.
